name: A Simple Game Where You Throw Cards Into A Furnace Until It Goes Out Or Explodes
name_original: A Simple Game Where You Throw Cards Into A Furnace Until It Goes Out Or Explodes
description:
You are a sitting in front of the furnace with special deck of cards

Your goal is to prolong fire as long as you can. The issue is the fire can fade out if you let temperature too low or burst in flames if you overheat it too much

You have a deck of cards that can increase or decrease furnace temperature

In addition, there are some special cards to help or sabotage your goal

The catch is you have a limited hand of four cards. If your hand is full and you have to draw a card, too bad. This card will be sent straight to the furnace. This card can be the last card you'll draw

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can spend 100 score points to draw + or - card with random amount. You can use this mechanic to get out of difficult situation

But this ability has a cooldown, so you can't spam it to hel

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There are multiple cards to draw:

- The most basic card - "give me points" card. Just increases your score

- Plain plus or minus temperature with various values

- Double or half your current temperature. Be careful - your thermometer shows values from 300 to 1000. Plan these cards carefully to not over\underheat your furnace

- Burn one card will burn the most left card you have in your hand without triggering the effect

 
- Burn all the cards will burn the whole hand, again, without triggering the effect

- And last but not the least the SWAP card. It will swap effects of all other cards (except points card).

This card will:

*  Swap + to -

*  Swap double to half

*  Swap burn one card to burn all the cards

* And reverse!     

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

- Drag cards into the furnace to burn them

- Press buttons under the score to buy + or - card

- Or simply let the luck decide your fate and do nothing. Cards will automatically burn in the furnace. But this can easily be your death
